content:
I get this when building rustdoc:

warning: `-Z symbol-mangling-version` is deprecated; use `-C symbol-mangling-version`

ripgrep shows these lines need to be updated:

src/bootstrap/builder.rs
992:            rustflags.arg("-Zsymbol-mangling-version=v0");
994:            rustflags.arg("-Zsymbol-mangling-version=legacy");

I tried updating them myself but ran into trouble, so posting here in case someone else can fix it.
Oops. I thought I'd found every case of -Zsymbol-mangling-version when I searched for code to update, but it looks like I missed the ones in bootstrap.
